name: Just a little planet
description:
Just a little planet cruising along in space with her four friends. Help her grow by dragging them around her !
You'll just need a mouse to play.

The fours elements are emitting rays, and crossing them on the planet will create new biomes !

Made by :

Morgane Abecassis  : Game Artist | Game Designer
Simon Kircher           : Game Artist | Game Designer

Nathan Mezza           : Game Developer
Pierre Beaudoin        : Game Developer
